main event: Observers sighted one to two round beam shafts of light in the Oregon area on 15 December 1965.
interesting points: The lights were round beams about the size of a watermelon and were blue-green in color., Observers reported hearing a sound as the objects seemed to disappear and reappear., The sighting lasted between 30 seconds to 5 minutes., The object traveled in a straight line towards the observers., The sightings coincided with the launch of a minuteman missile from Vandenberg.
sighted object: one to two round beam shafts of light
witness description: A FAA tower controller, a construction worker, and an observer in Albany, Oregon.
